Prince Kofi Amoabeng (amụrụ na Febụwarị 22, 1952) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye bụbu onye agha nke ndị agha Ghana

Ọ bụ onye guzobere UT Bank nke dara na 2017 n'oge nsogbu ụlọ akụ Ghana n'etiti ebubo na o mebiri ego site na ụlọ akụ ahụ.  Ọ nọ ugbu a n'okpuru ọgụ ụlọ ikpe na-aga n'ihu banyere ebubo ndị a mgbe e jidere ya na 14 Jenụwarị 2020, ma tọhapụ ya na mgbapụta nke nde cedi 110.
A mụrụ Amoabeng na 22 February 1952 na Bososo na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana
Amoabeng malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Penworth Preparatory School, ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Accra
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St Peter's Secondary School na Nkwatia Kwahu na Adisadel College na Cape Coast Ghana tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Ghana maka akara ugo mmụta ya

O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na nchịkwa n'afọ 1975 na 2nd-class upper honours site na Mahadum nke Ghana Business School. Mgbe ọ sonyechara n'usuu ndị agha, ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ site na Ministry of Defence iji chụsoo ọmụmụ na Royal Army Pay Corps, ebe ọ ruru eru dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego n'ime ọnwa 18 wee kpebie ịlaghachi n'ụlọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ.
Amoabeng malitere ọrụ ya na ndị agha Ghana n'April,1975Enyere ya ọrụ dịka onye isi ala na Nọvemba 1975.
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2020, Amoabeng boro ebubo nrụrụaka nke mkpokọta ego Ghana cedis dị nde 59.9 sitere na ụlọ akụ UT, ebe ọ bụ onye mebere ụlọ akụ ahụ dara n'oge nsogbu ụlọ akụ Ghana..
mbụ E mechara kwụsị ebubo ebubo na ndị ọka iwu na-ezube iweta ebubo ndị ọzọ..
